name: Keycloak
description: Open source identity and access management solution. Keycloak provides user federation, strong authentication, user management, fine-grained authorization, and more.
author: Keycloak Team

form_fields.label: Admin Username
form_fields.hint: Initial admin user for Keycloak management console

form_fields.label: Admin Password
form_fields.hint: Secure password for admin account. Change this immediately in production

form_fields.label: Database Password
form_fields.hint: PostgreSQL database password. Use a strong password

form_fields.label: Hostname
form_fields.hint: Full URL where Keycloak is exposed (e.g., https://keycloak.yourdomain.com). Should start with https://

form_fields.label: Hostname Strict HTTPS
form_fields.hint: Require HTTPS for hostname verification. Set to false when using reverse proxy with edge TLS

form_fields.label: Hostname Strict
form_fields.hint: Require exact hostname match. Set to false to accept requests on any hostname. Use false for reverse proxy

form_fields.label: Enable HTTP
form_fields.hint: Enable HTTP protocol. Required when using reverse proxy with edge TLS termination (proxy handles HTTPS)

form_fields.label: Proxy Headers Mode
form_fields.hint: How to parse proxy headers: 'forwarded' (RFC 7239) or 'xforwarded' (X-Forwarded-*). Required for reverse proxy
